clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in pleural space.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in pleural space.
Enlarged lymph nodes in pleural space, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of pleural space.
Small pneumothorax on the pleural space side.
